Multilanguage I Love You!!

You & your lover from difference nation?
Relax, below are 'I Love You' from at least 98 languages

Ek het jou lief

Ana Behibek (to a female)

T'estim molt (I love you a lot)

Love Calculator??

Hey!!! Love calculator???

"
We all know that a name can tell a lot about a person. Names are not randomly chosen: they all have a meaning.
Doctor Love knew this so he made another great invention just for the lonely you!

To find out what the chances for you and your dream partner are, just fill in both full names (both first and last name) in the two text boxes below, and press Calculate."
Click the 'link' below this to get into it..

10 Dietary Mistakes to Avoid

hola!
I read this and I feel this is very important to everyone in everyday life.

So, I summarized the 10 points as below :

1.Not eating enough protein, especially early in the day.

2.Skipping breakfast.

3.Skipping other meals because you didn't think ahead.

4.Eating carbohydrates(sugar) only.

5.Thinking in terms of "snacks" packaged in boxes and bags.

6.Consuming cheap, empty-calorie carbohydrates.
(example: Non-diet soda, potato chips, cookies, popcorn, and white bread)

7. Falling for the fat-free gimmick.
(usually non-fat food will still make you fat. How? more sugar it contains!.)

8.Not "fishing" for healthy protein.
(Generally speaking, plant fats are healthier than animal fats. But the fats in fish are an exception, especially those from darker fleshed ones like salmon. The omega-3 fatty acids they contain are just what the doctor ordered to keep your ticker ticking. In the meantime, substitute fish for another animal protein several times a week and supplement with omega-3s for good measure.)

9.Not drinking enough water.

10.Shopping in the center of the supermarket.
(just shopping, grabbing goods from there.--unless you need shampoo, styling cream, or stationery. Eventually tuna is good but canned one already crowded with chemicals and processed.)
(Actually you should also visit green corner, pick some fruits or vegetables and cook it yourself)

source: http://health.msn.com/nutrition/slideshow.aspx?cp-documentid=100218650&imageindex=1

My Horoscope~

May 2007

A Full Moon in Scorpio on May 2 will create drama. By May 3 your energy and attitude will improve. On May 6, set concrete goals for the future. By May 13 and 14, the Moon in your sign will increase your confidence. With Mars entering in your sign on May 15, you'll have the drive to achieve your goals. You'll tend to wear your heart on your sleeve on May 21. A Full Moon in Sagittarius on May 31 will bring an urge to make hasty decisions.

Chinese 'BEH' aka Horse horoscope

May

Your naturally expansive nature gets a dose of mystery and self-protection in the Month of the Snake. It can be difficult to communicate your true feelings this month. True friends care deeply. They want to hear what you are feeling. Being open and honest helps resolve conflicts and brings peace of mind. Not sharing can leave you lonely and depressed. You have a deeply spiritual side. Snake increases your natural intuition and compassion. Now is time to appreciate the beauty of life. Believe that you are loved and protected. Act on your first impulses. Snake supports your determination and willingness to stick with difficult situations. Pick your battles carefully. Forgive and forget all you can. Get outside as much as possible. It is time to appreciate the beauty of nature. You may want to become more active in efforts to protect and improve your community. You can make a difference.

i like Justin Timberlake

Justin Timberlake

Birth Date:
January 31, 1981

As an outgoing Aquarius with the Moon in party-animal Sagittarius and charismatic Leo on the Ascendant, it comes as no shock that Justin Timberlake has garnered a reputation as a bad boy. His romantic liaisons – which include past relationships with pop and film divas Britney Spears, Alyssa Milano and Cameron Diaz – are legend, and, with his Leonian good looks, he's very likely to attract a lot more.

Timberlake began his performing career in 1989's The New Mickey Mouse Club, where he met future band-mate J.C. Chasez. Later, he and Chasez re-entered the spotlight when they formed the pop band 'N Sync, and in 2000 released the smash hit album No Strings Attached. In 2002, Timberlake began work on his first solo album, Justified, which eventually went double platinum. Four years later, his second solo album, Future Sex/Love Sounds, which contained the #1 hit singles "Sexy Back" and "My Love," debuted at the top of the Billboard charts. He has won no fewer than eleven Grammy awards, and has also appeared in several films, including Black Snake Moan, Alpha Dog and Southland Tales.

Yet with Jupiter and Saturn, the business planets, conjunct in Libra in his financial sector, he does have his serious, business-oriented side. He has opened several restaurants, launched the William Rast clothing line, and started his own record company, JayTee Records. And the caring, altruistic side of Aquarius has not passed him by. In late 2005, Justin’s humanitarian activities in his native Tennessee earned him an award from the Grammy Association.

And take heart, girls: After his recent split with Cameron Diaz, Justin is unattached! Here is a tip from Justin himself: "A lot of girls have cheated on me in the past, so it's hard for me to trust. But once I fall, I fall hard." If you can get him to fall for you, with loyal and romantic Leo on the Ascendant, he’ll be yours for life!
